physical_appearance: "The image shows a loudspeaker. It is rectangular in shape and there are two circular knobs at the bottom of the loudspeaker. ""Rediffusion: The Great Family Entertainer"" is stated at the bottom of the loudspeaker. ""Digital and Broadcasting"" is stated at the bottom left hand side as well. The side surfaces of the loudspeaker is white in colour
subject_terms_1: while its driver in the front surface is black in colour." analog ways of life
subject_terms_2: radio (telecommunication systems) Radio Broadcasting Ways of life
